description: This resource defines a user role to be used in conjunction with a Manager Account.

AssignedPrivileges.description: The redfish privileges that this role includes.

enumDescriptions.ConfigureComponents: Able to configure components managed by this service.
enumDescriptions.ConfigureSelf: Able to change the password for the current user Account.
enumDescriptions.ConfigureUsers: Able to configure Users and their Accounts.
enumDescriptions.Login: Able to log into the service and read resources.

IsPredefined.description: This property is used to indicate if the Role is one of the Redfish Predefined Roles vs a Custom role.

OemPrivileges.description: The OEM privileges that this role includes.

enumDescriptions.HostBIOSConfigPriv: Able to configure Host BIOS Settings.
enumDescriptions.HostNICConfigPriv: Able to configure Host NIC Settings.
enumDescriptions.HostStorageConfigPriv: Able to configure Host Storage Settings.
enumDescriptions.RemoteConsolePriv: Able to remotely access the host system Remote Console, including video, keyboard, and mouse control.
enumDescriptions.SystemRecoveryConfigPriv: Able to manage the critical recovery firmware images on the Manager's Repository.
enumDescriptions.VirtualMediaPriv: Able to use the Virtual Media feature on the host system.
enumDescriptions.VirtualPowerAndResetPriv: Able to power-cycle or reset the host system. These activities interrupt system availability. A user with this privilege can diagnose the system by using the Generate NMI to System button.

RoleId.description: This property contains the name of the Role.

title: #Role.v1_2_1.Role
